title: Turn off, when I'm charging my phone
content:
I just have updated to Android 9 for my Pixel 2 XL. Since then, everytime when I pulg in my C-charger to my pixel2, my phone automatically turns off (it's still able to change my phone).  The display is blackout and shows some "battery Charging picture" . If I want to deal with my phone... I have to disconnect my phone from charger and trun on my phone. 

I already tried "check google update" & "safe mode"  etc.... 

I really need help... thank you .
